actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 19 of title 38, United States Code, to permit the unrestricted assignment of a beneficiary's interest in the proceeds of a Government Life Insurance policy in cases involving contested claims.

summary.text: Permits the unrestricted assignment of a beneficiary's interest in the proceeds of a National Service Life Insurance policy in cases involving contested claims.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 19 of title 38, United States Code, to permit the unrestricted assignment of a beneficiary's interest in the proceeds of a Government Life Insurance policy in cases involving contested claims.
